title: FTTH by LE
description:
Description
This is a template for an Initiative. Here are a few basic rules:
Any paragraph starting with is either a comment or an example. Such text can be removed while filling out the Initiative description.
It is recommended to use only plain text with no coloring and bold, underline and italics if needed.
Proposal Studio:
Benefit Hypothesis:
Which business value do we have?
What will I solve?
What is the risk when we don't realize this demand? Cost of delay
Proposal:
<An elevator pitch (value statement) that describes the initiative in a clear and concise way.>
For <customers>
who <do something>
the <solution>
is a <something – the ‘how’>
that <provides this value>
unlike <competitor, current solution or non-existing solution>
our solution <does something better — the ‘why’>
Current situation:
Problem statement:
In which situation does the problem occur? (Addition Daniel)
What is the problem and who is affected? (Addition Daniel)
New feature:
